CustomField.description: --DEPRECATED-- This field is optional unless the loan requires HMDA, then it is required. It is manually populated. This field indicates whether the loan is a high-cost mortgage under the Home Ownership and Equity Protection Act (HOEPA).
CustomField.label: -D HOEPA Status

value.fullName: Code 1 - For a loan that you originated or purchased that is subject to the Home Ownership and Equity Protection Act of 1994 (HOEPA), because the APR or the points and fees on the loan exceed the HOEPA triggers
value.label: Code 1 - For a loan that you originated or purchased that is subject to the Home Ownership and Equity Protection Act of 1994 (HOEPA), because the APR or the points and fees on the loan exceed the HOEPA triggers
